'''v0.11.0 alpha build 7''' is the seventh build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.11.0 alpha|v0.11.0]].

== Fixes ==

'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15317 13 bugs fixed]'''

* Fixed AABB on baby zombies
* Fixed potential crash on a mob spawner
* Fixed back button on the language screen
* Fixed player position on skin screen
* Fixed active nether reactor crashing when broken
* Fixed crash on rendering null-items
* Fixed wolves not syncing sitting animation in MP
* Fixed game being stuck on a black screen
* Fixed players not getting fall damage
* Fixed inventory not closing on death

'''From the 0.11.0 development versions'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8251}} - Crash after fishing boat, exploded creeper and minecart
* {{bug|MCPE-8309}} - The Custom Skins Option Is Missing

'''From the previous development version'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8350}} - When I change server from Creative to Survival, my friend who joined me in the server has unlimited items...</onlyinclude>
